meanings.definition: In a lively and animated manner.
meanings.sent1: She danced vivaciously at the party, moving with excitement and joy.
meanings.sent2: The children played vivaciously in the park, laughing and running around.
meanings.sent3: The puppy wagged its tail vivaciously, eager to play fetch with its owner.
meanings.sent4: The colors of the sunset painted the sky vivaciously, creating a breathtaking view.
meanings.sent5: Her laughter echoed vivaciously through the room, filling it with happiness.

meanings.sent1: He is a vivaciously cheerful person, always spreading positivity wherever he goes.
meanings.sent2: The vivaciously colored flowers brightened up the garden, adding a lively touch.
meanings.sent3: The vivaciously decorated cake looked almost too beautiful to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her vivaciously painted artwork captured the essence of joy and vibrancy.
meanings.sent5: The vivaciously written story kept the readers engaged from start to finish.
